name: Sinking Deeper (LD48)
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

I RECOMMEND THE DOWNLOAD BECAUSE WEBGL IS INCREDIBLY LAGGY

You are a scientist tasked with investigating the depths of the sea. However, you mistakenly dove too deep and your submarine broke down. The only part that remains active is (fortunately) the oxygen dispenser. You can't get back up, so if there is any hope it lies deeper. In the meantime, you might as well gather data in case you ever make it out of here alive...

Note: Most of the information from scanning creatures is fictional

Controls:

  • WASD to move, space to go up, shift to go down
  • Right click to collect oxygen
  • Click to scan
